subAddress: Specific location at address, e.g., unit number, back cottage, etc.
GroupAffiliation: Name(s) of the neighborhood group(s) you are affiliated
OtherContactInfo: Other Contact Info (Business Phone, Business Email,etc.)
SkillsForEmergency: Skills that are useful during disasters (Search and Rescue, First Aid, Fire Suppression, Communications, etc.)
EmergencyContactInfo: People outside the neighborhood to notify of your status (Name, phone, email)
SpecialNeeds: List people with mobility problems and medical issues, and children that may need care (Format: issue, name, birthyear, e.g. Child,John Doe,2009). Only one entry per household please.
Visitors: List short term (less than a year) visitors who are regularly in the structure, e.g., weekly house keeper, month long visiting relatives, etc. (Format: Name, Days present). Long term tenants should have their own spreadsheet record. Only one entry per household.
Pets: Pets (Format: Description, Name). Only one entry per household.
EmergencyEquipment: List resources that you are willing to share in a disaster (the number of people you are able to shelter for 1-3 days, food, ladders, cribbing, etc.). Only one entry per household.
ACAlertSignUp: Alameda County Alert (ACA) System Sign Up
GasShutOffValveInfo: Gas Shut Off Valve Description (Location on property, type:auto or manual, photo). Only one entry per household.
Comments: Any other comments If you leave the EmPrep group
InvolvementLevel: Choose level of involvement: Active(Send me Update Emails), NoEmailActive(Keep Me Listed, but no emals), No Involvement(Remove Me Altogether)
